00009 eolActor * eol_actor_load(char  *filename)
00010 {
00011   eolActor * act;
00012   act = eol_actor_new();
00013   if (!act)return NULL;
00014   act->model = eol_model_load(filename);
00015   return act;
00016 }

00028 void eol_actor_clear(eolActor *act)
00029 {
00030   if (!act)return;
00031   if (act->model != NULL)
00032   {
00033     eol_model_free(&act->model);
00034   }
00035   memset(act,0,sizeof(eolActor));
00036 }

00080 void eol_actor_set_frame_rate(
00081     eolActor *act,
00082     eolFloat rate
00083   )
00084 {
00085   if (!act)return;
00086   if (rate == 0)
00087   {
00088     eol_logger_message(
00089       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00090       "eol_actor:passed a 0 frame rate.\n"
00091     );
00092   }
00093   act->frameRate = rate;
00094 }

00096 eolActor * eol_actor_new()
00097 {
00098   eolActor *actor = NULL;
00099   actor = (eolActor *)malloc(sizeof(eolActor));
00100   if (actor == NULL)
00101   {
00102     eol_logger_message(
00103       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00104       "eol_actor:unable to allocate actor data!\n");
00105     return NULL;
00106   }
00107   memset(actor,0,sizeof(eolActor));
00108   return actor;
00109 }

00111 void eol_actor_free(eolActor **actor)
00112 {
00113   if ((!actor) || (!*actor))return;
00114   eol_actor_clear(*actor);
00115   free(*actor);
00116   *actor = NULL;
00117 }

00119 void eol_actor_set_action(
00120     eolActor * act,
00121     eolWord    actionName
00122   )
00123 {
00124   eolAction *action;
00125   if (!act)return;
00126   if (!act->model)return;
00127   if (strlen(actionName) <= 0)return;
00128   action = eol_model_get_action(act->model,actionName);
00129   if (action == NULL)
00130   {
00131     eol_logger_message(
00132       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00133       "eol_actor: model %s does not have action %s\n",
00134       act->model->name,actionName);
00135     return;
00136   }
00137   act->action = action;
00138   strncpy(act->actionName,actionName,EOLWORDLEN);
00139   act->frame = action->begin;
00140   act->frameRate = action->frameRate;
00141   act->frameDirection = 1;
00142 }
00143 
00144 eolBool eol_actor_next_frame(eolActor * act)
00145 {
00146   if (!act)return eolFalse;
00147   if (!act->model)return eolFalse;
00148   if (!act->action)return eolFalse;
00149   act->frame = act->frame + (act->frameRate * act->frameDirection);
00150   if (act->frame > act->action->end)
00151   {
00152     switch(act->action->type)
00153     {
00154       case eolActionLoop:
00155         act->frame = act->action->begin;
00156         return eolFalse;
00157       case eolActionPass:
00158         act->frame = act->action->end;
00159         return eolTrue;
00160       case eolActionOsci:
00161         act->frame = act->action->end;
00162         act->frameDirection = -1;
00163         return eolFalse;
00164     }
00165   }
00166   if (act->frame < act->action->begin)
00167   {
00168     switch(act->action->type)
00169     {
00170       case eolActionLoop:
00171         act->frame = act->action->begin;
00172         return eolFalse;
00173       case eolActionPass:
00174         act->frame = act->action->begin;
00175         return eolFalse;
00176       case eolActionOsci:
00177         act->frame = act->action->begin;
00178         act->frameDirection = 1;
00179         return eolTrue;
00180     }
00181   }
00182   return eolFalse;
00183 }
00184 
00185 eolFloat eol_actor_get_frame(eolActor *act)
00186 {
00187   if (!act)return 0;
00188   return act->frame;
00189 }
